name: Mirror Flower, Water Moon (鏡花水月) - GGJ2022
name_original: Mirror Flower, Water Moon (鏡花水月) - GGJ2022
description: A mirrored endless runner game based on the Asian proverb Mirror Flower, Water Moon (鏡花水月) - meaning something that can be seen but not touched, like a flower reflected in a mirror or the moon reflected on the water's surface.
